title: Can compost help change capitalism?
description: John Cossham wants more people to take up composting to encourage a circular economy.

title: A year in Calais: One migrant’s year-long attempt to cross the Channel
description: The BBC followed Iranian migrant Alex, as he tried to cross from France to the UK with a smuggler.

title: Twitch hate raids: Minority streamers have 'a target on their back'
description: Streamers tell Newsbeat about the targeted hate they get and what they want Twitch to do about it.

title: Sex Education: Isaac actor George Robinson gets intimate about disability
description: George Robinson on subverting expectations as Isaac - the Netflix show's first disabled character.

title: Prince Philip: Grandchildren recall a favourite royal prank
description: The personal reflections on the Duke of Edinburgh's sense of humour are part of a BBC documentary.

title: Community in race to buy remotest mainland pub
description: Locals are facing a challenge from potential private buyers to purchase The Old Forge in Knoydart.

title: How 'nerd' culture powered through the pandemic
description: Meet the online content creators beating the odds to build successful careers from their passions.

title: Usyk 'jumping in at deep end' after two heavyweight fights - Joshua
description: Anthony Joshua commends Oleksandr Usyk for "jumping in at the deep end" with a world heavyweight title tilt after just two fights in the class.

title: Why Serbia has soft spot for late Only Fools actor John Challis
description: Only Fools and Horses is hugely popular in Serbia, where tributes have been paid to John Challis.

title: Gas prices: 'I'm just watching the meter go up'
description: Customers caught in the middle of the energy price crisis face higher bills but are told not to panic.

title: Hotel Rwanda hero Paul Rusesabagina convicted on terror charges
description: A Rwandan court finds Paul Rusesabagina guilty of supporting a terrorist group.

title: Pfizer/BioNTech jab safe for children aged five to 11
description: The positive trial results could pave the way for vaccinating children younger than 12, if approved.

title: La Palma volcano: Lava destroys homes in the Canary Islands
description: A volcanic eruption on the Spanish island of La Palma has demolished homes and caused evacuations.

description: Damien Harris, Travis Kelce and Derrick Henry give defenders the run-around in the best plays from the second week of the NFL.

description: Paul Rusesabagina, who was portrayed in Hotel Rwanda, has gone from national hero to enemy of the state.

title: Canary Islands: Lava from erupting volcano destroys homes
description: The volcano on La Palma continues to spew lava after 5,000 were evacuated from villages in its path.

title: Gas firms seek help amid higher energy bill fears
description: The business secretary is holding crisis talks as firms battle to stay afloat amid a surge in gas prices.

title: M25 protests: Arrests made as Insulate Britain activists block motorways
description: Insulate Britain activists have caused disruption at the M25 and A1(M) in Hertfordshire.

title: Aukus: France pulls out of UK defence talks amid row
description: Paris is angry after Australia cancelled a submarine contract in favour of a deal with the UK and US.

title: Russia shooting: Gunman kills several at Perm University
description: The attacker is said to have walked on to the university campus on Monday morning and started shooting.

title: Killamarsh deaths: Man arrested after four bodies found
description: A school says it is closed as three of its students have been involved in the "tragic incident".

title: Everton's Rodriguez travels to Qatar for transfer talks
description: Everton midfielder James Rodriguez travels to Qatar for talks with a club before a potential move to the Middle East.

title: Carol Kirkwood: BBC Weather presenter pulled over by dog on live TV
description: Carol Kirkwood says she's fine after taking this tumble on BBC Breakfast when the guide dog went astray.

title: Paralysed former New Zealand all-rounder Cairns faces his 'greatest challenge'
description: Former New Zealand all-rounder Chris Cairns says he is "grateful to be here" despite being left paralysed from a spinal stroke during surgery.

title: Emmy Awards 2021: The Crown and Ted Lasso sweep major categories
description: Netflix's royal drama and Apple's comedy series swept the drama and comedy prizes at Sunday's event.

description: Boris Johnson says he has a "six out of 10" chance of securing pledges before the COP26 conference.

title: Crash cyclist Josh Quigley set to achieve new Guinness World Record
description: Josh Quigley is believed to have broken Jack Thompson's record by cycling 2,179 miles in a week.

description: The Premier League title race is only just getting started, but Chelsea are seriously impressive right now, says MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer.

description: Lionel Messi makes his home debut for Paris St-Germain but is replaced in the second half as they beat Lyon.

description: Netflix drama The Crown and Apple TV Plus comedy Ted Lasso were the stars of the Emmy Award.

title: Football agent Aidy Ward broke rules by targeting minors

title: Giving birth under the Taliban
